name: 王韶君
objective:
本課程透過閱讀不同類型的文學主題與作家作品，引領大家認識臺灣文學史，時間上，從清治、日治一直到戰後與當代臺灣，一同了解臺灣社會的發展，認識臺灣歷史。透過文學閱讀與理解，進一步貼近臺灣這塊土地與生活，以及對人與文化的觀察與關懷。
This course through reading different types of literary themes and the works of writers, this course will jointly understand the history of Taiwanese literature. In terms of time, from the Qing Dynasty and the Japanese colonial period to the post-war and contemporary Taiwan, we will learn about the development of Taiwanese society and the history of Taiwanese society. And understanding, to get closer to the land and life of Taiwan, as well as to observe and care for people and culture.
